title: I was there
creator_credit: Central Film O, Teamfilm AS and Kristian Ryhammer
brief_description: A survey of the modern integrated transport system in Norway - a rail ticket entitles you to travel by train, boat or bus and you may break your journey when and where you like. Shows the modern cities, historic buildings, old fishing villages and the spectacular scenery. (Awards: Lisboa)
